unnormalised: Adv. Verma mentioned in the meeting today that Section 135 of the Companies Act, 2013 needs to be carefully considered for CSR compliance, especially after the amendment dated 19/01/2021. Heard ITC is being extra cautious after the penalty slapped on Tata Steel back in '18 for a similar violation.
normalised: Advocate Verma mentioned in the meeting today that Section one hundred and thirty five of the Companies Act, two thousand and thirteen needs to be carefully considered for C-S-R compliance, especially after the amendment dated nineteenth January two thousand and twenty one. Heard I-T-C is being extra cautious after the penalty slapped on Tata Steel back in two thousand and eighteen for a similar violation.
